title: ðŸš¨Cam Newton released by the Patriots - Emergency Podcast (Football 8/31)
description:
Well, cut day couldn't have gotten off to a crazier start. It's not often a projected starting quarterback gets released, but that's what happened Tuesday as the Patriots let go of Cam Newton. Will Brinson and Ryan Wilson discuss the shocking move and why it happened. They also look at the outlook for New England with Mac Jones as the starter and Brinson insistsÂ on placing a certain wager IMMEDIATELY. Also, where will Cam land next if he truly wants to remain a QB1? The guys offer a couple of suggestions. Join us later Tuesday for a full CUT DAY reaction episode.Â 

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @E_DeBerardinis

Will Brinson and Ryan Wilson discuss the shocking move and why it happened. They also look at the outlook for New England with Mac Jones as the starter and Brinson insistsÂ on placing a certain wager IMMEDIATELY. Also, where will Cam land next if he truly wants to remain a QB1? The guys offer a couple of suggestions. Join us later Tuesday for a full CUT DAY reaction episode.Â
